a plant whose smell is very attractive to cats: I grow nepeta in the flowerbed that runs along the stone wall in front of my vegetable patch. If the weather is sunny, nepeta will keep producing flowers until the end of October. Synonyms
catmint
catnip
More examplesFewer examplesOur cat loves the fragrance of nepeta.Nepeta is a really useful plant that you can use as a substitute for lavender.When the nepeta is in flower it is often visited by bees.The garden is full of rich colours from purple irises, salvias, and nepeta.
